snippet: Dan Girardi broke a tie late in the second period in a game in which he moved into 10th place on the list of players who have played the most games for the Rangers.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Calgary Flames, 4-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dan Girardi broke a tie late in the second period in a game in which he moved into 10th place on the list of players who have played the most games for the Rangers.

headline.print_headline: Bouncing Back From Loss, Rangers Cruise Past Flames
headline.main: Bouncing Back From Loss, Rangers Cruise Past Flames
